readability_reflection: String concatenation, mostly because I am used to it. With time and experience, I believe interpolation would be more readable.
comprehension_debugging: Interpolation seemed like I needed to think more about the output.
preference_rationale: I would probably prefer interpolation. The necessity to include [+ "..." +] between variable names could result in bugs.
learning_curve: Experience with string concatenation made it easier to understand, but my limited experience with interpolation made it harder to understand quickly and intuitively.
